Academic Affairs.description: The institutional office that oversees a variety of academic programs and departments. It plays a pivotal role in advising students and assisting them as they navigate their academic pathway towards completing their degree. The Academic Affairs facilitates students with a whole range of academic functions including admission, pre-registration, registration, examination & grading function and processing student requests. The section is responsible for the implementation of the decisions taken on academic matters by the Senate.

Message.content: We extend hearty welcome to all students who have joined IIT Jammu, the fastest growing third generation IIT. IIT Jammu blends the approach of interactive and hands-on learning into its pedagogic principles. Curriculum template in the academic system of IIT Jammu has been structured to be multi-disciplinary to cater to the rapidly changing scientific and technological needs of the global community. The programs are designed to encourage students to relate academic theory to real-world practice and to collaborate with like-minded community in and out of the lecture hall.
Message.author: Prof. Kannan Iyer
